bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : Map('账号：');
var a = 0;
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (java.ajax(Get('url')).includes(Account)) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) {
        exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ✨【' + Account + '】✨ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏时间', `{{Get('url')}}/user/${cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")}/favorite/albums?o=mr`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏更新', `{{Get('url')}}/user/${cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")}/favorite/albums?o=mp`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('最近阅读', `{{Get('url')}}/user/${cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")}/favorite/watchlist`, 1, 0.25, false));
        a = 4;
    }
}

}

header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "激活码：", type: "text" },
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  { name: "账号：", type: "text" },
  { name: "密码：", type: "password" },
  {
    name: "      💡登录账号💡      ",
    type: "button",
    action: "Login()"
  },
  {
    name: "      💡源站更新💡      ",
    type: "button",
    action: "update()"
  },
  { name: "  查看当前  ", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "   查看历史   ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },
  { name: "  恢复默认  ", type: "button", action: "test(0)" },
  { name: "  繁体搜索  ", type: "button", action: "search_TC()" },
  { name: "   简繁转换   ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "  目录整理  ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "① 禁漫 ✈️", type: "button", action: "$(1)" },
  { name: " ② 禁漫 ✈️ ", type: "button", action: "$(2)" },
  { name: "③ 禁漫 ✈️", type: "button", action: "$(3)" },
  { name: "④ 禁漫 🐰", type: "button", action: "$(4)" },
  { name: " ⑤ 禁漫 🐰 ", type: "button", action: "$(5)" },
  { name: "⑥ 禁漫 🐰", type: "button", action: "$(6)" },
  { name: " ⑦ 禁漫 ⑦ ", type: "button", action: "$(7)" },
  { name: "  ⑧ 禁漫 ⑧  ", type: "button", action: "$(8)" },
  { name: " ⑨ 禁漫 ⑨" , type: "button", action: "$(9)" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换日期  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: " 全部 ", type: "button", action: "o(0)" },
  { name: " 本  月 ", type: "button", action: "o(1)" },
  { name: " 本  周 ", type: "button", action: "o(2)" },
  { name: " 今  日 ", type: "button", action: "o(3)" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换线路  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "   线路[1]   ", type: "button", action: "p(1)" },
  { name: "    线路[2]    ", type: "button", action: "p(2)" },
  { name: "   线路[3]   ", type: "button", action: "p(3)" },

  {
    name: "                   设置填写的页数为评论加载页数                   ",
    type: "button",
    action: "f()"
  },
  { name: "页数：", type: "text" },

  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    eval(String(source.loginUrl));
    Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : Map('账号：');
    if(String(Account).length > 0 && baseUrl.includes('/login')) {
        Login();
        let url = String(Get('url') + '/user/' + cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") + '/favorite/albums');
        java.setContent(java.get(url,Headers).body());
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/user/')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-6.col-sm-3.col-md-3.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.video-title.title-truncate');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/watchlist')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-3.col-sm-2.col-md-2.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.image-item-text');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    var list = java.getElements('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = $('.m-t-5.title-truncate.video-title');
        var authors = [];
        var titleTruncateElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in titleTruncateElements) {
            if (!titleTruncateElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                authors.push(String(titleTruncateElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        author = authors.join('/').replace(/(&| & | \|,|\s)/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/');
        var kinds = [];
        var kindElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in kindElements) {
            if (kindElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                kinds.push(String(kindElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        kind = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
        kind = '♥ ' + list[i].select('.text-white').text() +',' + $('.category-icon').replace(/[ ]/g, ',') + ','+ kind.replace(java.s2t($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(java.t2s($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(/,+/g, ',').replace(/,已/g, ',').replace(/中,|中$/g, ',');
        kind = String(kind).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1');
        img = list[i].select('.img-responsive.lazy_img');
        cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay-albums a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || String(next_1.select('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15')).includes(String(list[0]))) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15.well');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
    for (i in list) {
        name = $('.m-t-5.title-truncate.video-title');
        var authors = [];
        var authorElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in authorElements) {
            if (!authorElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                authors.push(String(authorElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        author = authors.join('/').replace(/(&| & | \|,|\s)/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/');
        var kinds = [];
        var kindElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in kindElements) {
            if (kindElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                kinds.push(String(kindElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        kind = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
        kind = '♥ ' + list[i].select('.text-white').text() + ',' + $('.category-icon').replace(/[ ]/g, ',') + ',' + kind.replace(java.s2t($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(java.s2t($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(/,+/g, ',').replace(/,已/g, ',').replace(/中,|中$/g, ',');
        kind = String(kind).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1');
        img = list[i].select('.img-rounded.img-responsive.lazy_img');
        cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/\/[^/]+$/, '/') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    var searchkey = java.get(Get('url') + "searchkey");
    if (!list[0] || String(next_1.select('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15.well')).includes(String(list[0])) || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var list = java.getElements('.btn-toolbar a').attr('href').includes('/') ? java.getElements('.btn-toolbar a') : java.getElements('.read-block.p-b-5.p-t-5 a.0');
    var date = String(java.getElements('.float-right.p-t-5').text()).replace(/.* /, '');
    for (i in list) {
        title = list[i].text();
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        title = String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/(.*?[话話章回期])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ').replace(/\s\d{4}\s\d{2}\s\d{2}$/, '');
        data.push({
            'title': i == list.length - 1 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': Get('url') + list[i].attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1),
            'time': java.getElements('.btn-toolbar  a') ? list[i].select('.hidden-xs').text() : String(java.getElements('.float-right.p-t-5').text()).replace(/.* /, '')
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(Get('url') + "searchkey", e);
    return Get('url') + '/search/photos/' + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1) + '&search_query=' + e.replace(/\s.*$|\/.*$/g, '') + '&main_tag=0&page={{page}}';
}(key));
</js>
